Key Match Events: Mohamed Salah received treatment for a hamstring injury and was substituted in the first half
Mohammed Kudus scored a goal for Ghana in the 45th minute
Omar Marmoush scored an equalizer for Egypt in the 65th minute
Mostafa Mohamed scored an equalizer for Egypt in the 68th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Mohamed Salah's injury is concerning for Egypt fans and Liverpool
Egypt and Ghana drew 2-2 in a thrilling match
Emilio Nsue scored a hat-trick for Equatorial Guinea against Guinea-Bissau
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Ham forward Mohammed Kudus scored a brilliant goal
Ivory Coast and Nigeria drew 0-0, with Nigeria winning a penalty shootout 4-2
Others: Equatorial Guinea's Emilio Nsue became the first player to score a hat-trick in the Africa Cup of Nations since 2008
